title: Show launch preloader on every app open (not on route changes)

requirements.text: Update the app-level preloader gating so the existing animated preloader displays on every fresh app open/load, but never on internal route/page changes within the SPA.

quotes:
It should appear anytime the user opens it 
No it shouldn't show on every page load it should only show on the initial lunch 
Yes the timing and animation should say exactly as currently bill

acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened in a new browser tab/window (or after fully closing and reopening the app), the preloader is shown before the main UI renders.
Navigating between routes (e.g., Home → Trending → Profile) does not re-trigger the preloader.
Refreshing/reloading the page triggers the preloader again (because this is a new app open/load).

requirements.text: Preserve the current preloader animation timing and visuals exactly as implemented in FirstLaunchPreloader, including the Z → I → Z → O reveal sequence and fade-out behavior.

quotes: Yes the timing and animation should say exactly as currently bill

acceptanceCriteria: No changes to the step timings (1s, 2s, 3s, 4s, hold until 5.5s, then 0.5s fade-out callback) are introduced.
The preloader continues to use /assets/generated/zizo-preloader-logo.dim_512x512.png and renders with the existing CSS-driven clip-path reveal.

requirements.text: Remove or replace the current persistent 'first launch only' localStorage behavior (key: 'app-first-launch-complete') so it no longer prevents the preloader from showing on subsequent app opens.

quotes: It should appear anytime the user opens it

acceptanceCriteria: After the change, previously-set localStorage value 'app-first-launch-complete' does not stop the preloader from appearing on a new app open/load.
The preloader completion still transitions cleanly to the main app UI without a flash of unstyled content.

constraints: Do not show the preloader on internal SPA route changes; it must only appear on a fresh app open/load.
Do not modify the preloader timing/animation/visuals.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Building or integrating a website-to-APK conversion service.
Adding ads, analytics, push notifications, or real-time features.
Redesigning the overall app UI beyond the preloader gating behavior change.
